column1: During my GOTV stops in Lehigh Northampton Bucks and Berks counties I saw firsthand how excited and energized voters are to elect Democrats up and down the ballot and support a message of fairness and justice

Today's election will become a foundation for next year's election.  We have grassroots energy and enthusiasm on our side. Let's send a clear message that economic and social justice can triumph over fear and division
I look forward to electing @JudgeMcCaffery and @AGHforJudge to the Pennsylvania Superior Court.  They will be judges we can trust to keep the doors of justice open to all

Today is Election Day in Pennsylvania and polls are open from 7 AM to 8 PM.  Every election matters so please make a plan to vote!  Do you know where your polling place is?  If not you can find it here: https://t.co/abwykeyv0P

Great energy tonight in Reading!  @BerksCountyDems are ready to vote tomorrow for our candidates up and down the ballot and send Eddie Moran who is truly inspiring to City Hall! https://t.co/oyNDfOWevv
I was glad to be joined by @JoshShapiroPA and @SenSharifStreet.  Last GOTV stop: Reading!"

I spent the day with energized Democratic voters and volunteers in Allentown Easton and Levittown who are committed to getting out the vote for @JudgeMcCaffery @AGHforJudge and countywide candidates this Tuesday November 5th!

@JoeBiden has spent most of his life in public service fighting for working families first as a Senator later as Vice President and I know he'll continue that fight as our next President.  The middle class cannot afford another four years of President Donald Trump.

From the personal wealth left to him to the strong economy left to him by the Obama/Biden administration President Trump has inherited his every success. And he's presided over economic growth that has enriched billionaires and corporations at the expense of the middle class.

@JoeBiden fights for the middle class because those are his roots and those are his values.  He's a stark contrast to President Trump who has bowed at the altar of corporations and special interests since the day he took office.
I'm happy that my friend @JoeBiden is back in our hometown today talking about middle-class values and how to help working families make ends meet.  https://t.co/KfSqxoYfcF
Hey Twitter! I’ll be taking over the @JoeforNH Twitter account today as I travel the Granite State and talk to voters about Vice President @JoeBiden. Follow along! #NHPolitics
Great to meet with Democrats in Erie tonight to talk about the work we need to do in 2019 and 2020 to elect more Democrats up and down the ballot https://t.co/Lcyr53ZCVb
I’m excited to support Governor Hickenlooper in #COSen https://t.co/KoIHlaRm7O

On Tuesday August 20th voters in Union and Snyder counties have an opportunity to send @drjennforpa85 to the PA State House to fight for working families.  Let’s flip this seat and turn the 85th District blue!
Vice President Biden recognizes that health care is a basic human right and that guaranteeing universal coverage is a mission worthy of a great nation

Vice President Biden’s healthcare plan will guarantee coverage for millions of Americans reduce the cost of healthcare for families who already have insurance and protect and build on the Affordable Care Act
I welcome @JoeBiden to Pittsburgh today where he will talk about his vision for the middle class and how he will work to ensure our economy works for all
Joining @KasieDC soon to discuss my support for @JoeBiden https://t.co/3lO6mQNt4H
At this make-or-break moment for the middle class our children and our workers America needs Vice President @JoeBiden to be its next President. https://t.co/D43PTHO3Lg #Joe2020
I am proud to endorse my friend Joe Biden for President https://t.co/ZWTlwJaQ59
Casey lobbies for Democratic primary debate in Pennsylvania https://t.co/C5szXTbOGQ

Today is @Bob_Casey's birthday! Will you help us celebrate Bob's hard work for the people of Pennsylvania by signing his card?  Sign the card: "Happy birthday Bob Casey!" >> https://t.co/rU83FSg2EI https://t.co/3qi8XTgkyf

The Casey family is getting ready to celebrate @Bob_Casey's birthday tomorrow and wanted to give you a chance to sign his birthday card. Will you add your name?  Sign Bob's birthday card! >>  https://t.co/rU83FSxE3i https://t.co/jCghHVYEXG
Congrats to @pamforpa on winning #PA37 and flipping it from red to blue. Thank you to organized labor and so many volunteers for getting out the vote.
Senator Casey is ready to defend this seat and help Democrats win back a majority in the U.S. Senate. Will you stand with him and renew your support before midnight?  https://t.co/PcNEH5lFCM

To win a majority in the U.S. Senate we need to defend every seat. We're not waiting to build support -- we're asking you to renew your support for Bob Casey before tomorrow's end-of-quarter deadline. Will you chip in? https://t.co/PcNEH5lFCM
We can't afford to take any race or any seat for granted. Will you show you're standing with Bob by renewing your support before Sunday's end-of-quarter deadline?   https://t.co/PcNEH5lFCM
